title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: When changing the text in StyledText with word wrap enabled, the software performs multiple redraws for each visible line.
EB: This issue should be addressed so that there is at most one redraw for each visible line during text change with word wrap.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Add the following line to the method performPaint in StyledText:
   System.out.println('lineCount ' + lineCount + ', paintY ' + paintY + ', renderHeight ' + renderHeight);
2. Run the test case and observe the redraws occurring.
